name: Lord of the Flies (DBrey)
description:
Explore your surroundings, filled with creepy toys which seems to be... alive? Find an exit and get out of there

But be careful and choose your moves wisely, as some creatures might find your presence... succulent. Be sure they don't find out and beware of possible traps

If any monster finds you, run as your life depends on it, because it might actually be the case

Controls

  • Move with WASD
  • Jump with SpaceBar
  • Run with Left Shift
  • Crouch with Alt
  • Pause game with P or Escape

All game development made by dbrey. All 3D models and mostly all sounds in the game are NOT made by me.

 
You can find the credits of all of them in the Credits inside the game. If any resource used in the game is yours and it's not mentioned in the credits, please send me a message.

Some details

This is only a demo, which means it might have some errors. If anything weird happen, feel free to restart the level in the Pause Menu.

If this demo does well (a lot of downloads and support) and I get enough time and help, I will improve and develop the rest of the game.
